reference-wr.title: Supported Openstack Features
reference-wr.shortdesc: This section documents the supported and unsupported items within the upstream opensource OpenStack REST APIs.

section.p: Supported indicates that the functionality works and has been explicitly verified.
Unsupported indicates that the functionality either will not work or has not been explicitly verified.

entry.p: Servers with block device mapping format
Servers and images with disk config
Limits with project usage for administrators
NOTE: Titanium Server Router Instances are HA protected across compute nodes.
NOTE: no support for custom metadata; only supports a subset of Swift ACLs.
NOTE: no support for expiring objects, no support for object versioning, no support for CORS, no support for Static Website
